long_description: You'll be the envy of other travelers with the lightweight 22 in. Sherpani Latitude Wheeled Luggage, thanks to its vibrant exterior embroidery and easy-rolling spinner wheels. Unique Sherpani fabric pattern lets you pick out your luggage quickly in the baggage-claim area. High-rebound spinner wheels are whisper-quiet. Smooth, one-touch retractable handle guides bag effortlessly. Sturdy ripstop-nylon construction features durable skid plates and reinforcement on high-wear areas. Large main compartment comes with a removable packing cube measuring 17 in. x 13 in. x 3 in. Embroidered paneling on the exterior of the Sherpani Latitude Wheeled Luggage is silicone-treated for water and stain resistance. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: You'll be the envy of other travelers with the lightweight 22 in. Sherpani Latitude Wheeled Luggage, thanks to its vibrant exterior embroidery and easy-rolling spinner wheels.
